original_text: And they slew the kings of Midian, beside the rest of them that were slain; namely, Evi, and Rekem, and Zur, and Hur, and Reba, five kings of Midian: Balaam also the son of Beor they slew with the sword.
korean_text: 그 죽인 자 외에 미디안의 다섯 왕을 죽였으니 미디안의 왕들은 에위와 레겜과 수르와 후르와 레바이며 또 브올의 아들 발람을 칼로 죽였더라

sentences.original_text: And they slew the kings of Midian
beside the rest of them that were slain
namely, Evi, and Rekem, and Zur, and Hur, and Reba
sentences.korean_translation: 즉, 에비와 레겜과 수르와 훌과 레바

sentences.original_text: Balaam also the son of Beor
